entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Forillon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
